text: approaching the alignment of the Stellar Spiral Bridge that runs from D-9 Andromeda down through the D-4 Solar Spiral to Earth. Earth’s alignment with each spiral of the Stellar Spiral Bridge occurs in six phases, beginning with the D-4 Solar Spiral upward through the D-9 Andromeda Spiral. The point at which a Stellar Spiral aligns with the Merkaba Field spirals of Earth begins a Transmutative Stellar Activation. Between 5/5/2000 and 2017 Earth will experience six Stellar Activations, through which the six Stellar Spirals of the multidimensional Earth-to-Andromeda Stellar Bridge progressively align with Earth’s Merkaba Fields.
